evidence.claim: Raintree Systems utilizes AWS and Azure for its infrastructure.
The company complies with HIPAA regulations in its services.
Raintree supports X12 EDI transaction sets for healthcare-specific communications.
They implement HL7 and FHIR standards for data exchange.
Integration of EHR APIs in their platform for healthcare data management.

icp.icp_reason: Raintree Systems utilizes X12 EDI and supports healthcare data exchanges, qualifying them as an ICP.
